QuestData.Title: The Mark of Defiance
QuestData.Description: As you look upon the Frostwolf banner you remember struggles that have led you and the Frostwolves to this point.$b$bRuk'gan has suffered in his battles with the Thunderlord and would appreciate an extra show of defiance. $b$bAs the banner rustles in the wind you're inspired to mark the foes of the Frostwolf with its standard.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Battle-Worn Frostwolf Banner on the corpses of 6 Thunderlord Orcs in Agurak's Fall.
